documents.document: Opportunity may knock only once, but temptation leans on the doorbell.
Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do.
Dream it. Believe it. Achieve it.
We all have difficult days, have faith. https://t.co/4RqDIRdHfx
What would life be if we had no courage to attempt anything. -Vincent Van Gogh
Being positive in a negative situation is not naive. It's leadership.
If we did all the things we are capable of, we would literally astound ourselves. -Thomas Edison
Very true. https://t.co/eX6kUez5XZ
Let yourself be silently drawn by the strange pull of what you really love. It will not lead you astray.
You are not what has happened to you. You are what you choose to become.
Lord, lead me so I can lead others.
We all fall, pick yourself up and start a new. https://t.co/egpCgSLz2Q
When you say yes to others, make sure you are not saying no to yourself.
I can accept failure, everyone fails at something. But I can't accept not trying. - Michael Jordan
You don't have to have it all figured out to move forward.
Love is always a demonstration - not just a set of words or a feeling.

RT @LifeLimits: What's your favourite comfort food? :)
Get this awesome tee here --> https://t.co/KitzpJwFOI https://t.co/E8V0XGa1Sb
I choose to be happy today. https://t.co/UgmSpQRUBH
Kind words can be short and easy to speak, but their echoes are truly endless. -Mother Theresa
Time you enjoy wasting, was not wasted. -John Lennon
Don't go around saying the world owes you a living. The world owes you nothing. It was here first. - Mark Twain
You will never change your life until you change something you do daily. - Mike Murdoch
Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop your strengths. -Arnold Schwarzenegger
It's never too late - never too late to start over, never too late to be happy. -Jane Fonda
Great point. https://t.co/0gM2efqIhK
The only person you should strive to be better than, is the person you were yesterday.
3 great pieces of advice. https://t.co/Eb8EB39LDc
The best & most beautiful things in life cannot be seen, not touched, but are felt in the heart. -Helen Keller
Choose positivity today.
When you lose something, don't think of it as a loss; accept it as the gift that gets you on the path you were meant to travel on.
Intelligence without ambition is a bird without wings.
Worry does nothing but steal your joy and keep you very busy doing nothing.
Every day may not be good but there is something good in every day.
What lies behind us & what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us. -Ralph Waldo Emerson
The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall. -Nelson Mandela
True!! https://t.co/RF61pIBnnm
If you desire to make a difference in the world, you must be different from the world.
The quality of your thinking determines the quality of your life. - A.R. Bernard
Do just once what others say you can't do, and you will never pay attention to their limitations again. - James R. Cook
If you think education is expensive try ignorance. - Derek Bok
Beautiful things happen when you distance yourself from negativity.
The happiness of your life depends on the quality of your thoughts.
Count your rainbows, not your thunderstorms.
Look for the good in every moment. https://t.co/idrnqn5ACn
Without dreams, we reach nothing. Without love, we feel nothing. And without God, we are nothing.
Because we are all one when we forgive others we forgive ourselves, which is the first step in the healing process.
It is better to look ahead & prepare than to look back & regret. -Jackie Joyner-Kersee
By being yourself, you put something wonderful in the world that was not there before. - Edwin Elliot
If you can see the positive sides of everything, you'll be able to live a much richer life than others. - Celestine Chua
You deserve a vacation :) https://t.co/19Z3IRtRRx
Learn to trust the journey, even when you do not understand it.
Before you can win, you have to believe you are worthy. -Mike Ditka
When you do something out of love, you don't count the cost.
Great advice. https://t.co/0pFIIan7up
With every rising of the sun, think of your life as just begun. -Unknown
Give more, expect less.
Everyday. https://t.co/SRtxXCW2KZ
Life isn't measured by the breathes we take but the moments that take our breath away.
Laughter is the sound of the soul dancing. https://t.co/aSPy6AYH7U
Promote what you love instead of bashing what you hate.
If you want to fly, you have to give up the stuff that weighs you down.
Your passion is priceless. Never stop the pursuit. https://t.co/F4XQrzgroO
Surround yourself only with people who are going to lift you higher.
At this very moment, life is perfect.
Things turn out best for the people who make the best of the way things turn out. -John Wooden
Change is hard at first, messy in the middle and gorgeous at the end. https://t.co/OHjOeeqtai

Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up. - Thomas Edison

RT @FaithReeI: https://t.co/ir7ID3wtnA
Being rejected from something good just means you were being pointed toward something better.
Our lives begin to end the day we become silent about things that matter. - Martin Luther King
Yes there is!! https://t.co/4CE0sdavpj
It's not about having the skill to do something. It's about having the will, desire & commitment to be your best. -Robert Hernandez
Don't love too soon. Don't trust too fast. Don't quit too early. Don't expect too high. Don't talk too much.

Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you've imagined!
After a storm always comes the calm. https://t.co/T1Gkap4wsF
What defines us is how well we rise after falling.
No one has ever made himself great by showing how small someone else is.
Your beliefs don't make you a better person, your behavior does. #walkthetalk

Have faith… https://t.co/b5Ds9gbXwX
Tell the truth or someone will tell it for you. - Stephanie Klein
Without Dreams We reach nothing. Without Love We feel nothing. Without God We are nothing.
Do it with passion or not at all. https://t.co/0Qw2S0imyb
You're never a loser until you quit trying. -Mike Ditka
Don't wait. The time will never be just right. -Napoleon Hill
Pray, forgive yourself, appreciate others, listen to your gut, do things you enjoy, & remind yourself that we are all loved & connected.
Hold your head up high. https://t.co/GCbqKRjVft
